segments.text: You are blue in the face , arn't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The cat has eaten my fish , I'll kill it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But supposing your son killed like the fish , what do you think then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So beat the cat , but don't kill it .
segments.speaker: S1
